comments.body: What bad thing happens if we omit this?

`nil` selector is translated as matching nothing:
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/18402f6c51e9db2379f5ed5fcb6993dab9ce2e2f/staging/src/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/apis/meta/v1/helpers.go#L33

 But we want the default to be matching everything.
